meanings.definition: Pasqueflowers: a plant of the buttercup family with purple or white flowers.
meanings.sent1: In the garden, the pasqueflowers bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The pasqueflowers added a touch of color to the meadow.
meanings.sent3: The pasqueflowers seemed to dance in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the pasqueflowers, bringing joy to all around.
meanings.sent5: The children loved picking pasqueflowers on sunny days.

meanings.definition: Pasqueflowers: the flowers of the pasqueflower plant.
meanings.sent1: She carefully arranged the pasqueflowers in a vase.
meanings.sent2: The pasqueflowers were delicate and fragrant.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to play with the pasqueflowers, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: His smile bloomed like the pasqueflowers in spring.
meanings.sent5: The field was a sea of pasqueflowers, a sight to behold.
